title: CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case Orange
descriptions:
**CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit with Plastic Toolbox Storage Case - Orange**

Introducing the perfect tool set for your DIY needs, the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set General Household Hand Kit. This comprehensive kit, designed with both the amateur DIY enthusiast and the avid handyman in mind, includes a wide array of tools to handle various household repairs and projects with ease.

**Key Features:**
- **Tool Count:** 39 pieces
- **Suitable For:** Small repairs, DIY projects
- **Included Items:** Hammer, Pliers, Screwdrivers, Tape Measure
- **Durability:** Heat treated and chrome plated for long-lasting performance
- **Corrosion Resistance:** Ensures tools remain in good condition over time
- **Storage:** Comes with a durable plastic toolbox storage case
- **Organization:** The storage case includes organizer compartments for easy tool management
- **Portability:** Lightweight design with a carrying handle for convenient transportation
- **Ideal For:** DIY amateurs and avid handymen
- **Color:** Orange

**Why Choose the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set?**
- **Comprehensive Tool Kit:** With 39 tools, you have everything you need for a variety of tasks.
- **Durable and Reliable:** Heat treated and chrome plated tools provide exceptional durability and resistance to corrosion.
- **Easy to Organize:** The plastic toolbox storage case comes with organizer compartments to keep your tools neatly arranged.
- **Convenient and Portable:** The lightweight design and carrying handle make it easy to take your tools with you wherever you go.
- **Perfect Gift Idea:** Ideal for DIY enthusiasts, perfect for gifts or stocking stuffers.

Whether you're fixing a leaky faucet, assembling furniture, or tackling any other small repair or DIY project, this tool set is your go-to solution. Its durable construction and thoughtful design ensure that you'll have everything you need to get the job done right. Order now and enjoy hassle-free home repairs and maintenance with the CARTMAN 39 Piece Tool Set.
